instructions: Open the Mail app on your iPhone. If you have multiple inboxes, select the one containing the thread you want to mute or tap All Mailboxes . Swipe left on the thread you want to mute. Tap the More option (it looks like three dots in a gray circle). Tap Mute . Muted threads have an icon that looks like a bell with a line through it. Repeat these steps, but tap Unmute in the More menu, to turn notifications back on.
